page.title: 07A Newcomer in Alveston
page.content: I used to live in Heywood just outside Manchester. Heywood is quite a large place.Some of Heywood is a bit grotty and vandalised.Alot of heavy goods travel on the main road.Before we moved here we had a look at the secondary schools and catchment areas.My mum and dad decided that we would move here because they thought Marlwood was quite a good school and they liked Alveston.I felt a bit strange at first leaving my old school and friends and finding new friends but I soon settled in.Heywood is bigger than Alveston and both have hardly any industrial development . There are more small shops, youth clubs and scout packs in Heywood but we had to travel in the car to go on country side walks, where as in Alveston you don't have to.
